club_treasurer_responsibilities.establish_budget: Establish Club budget for the year to ensure that the Club functions within its means
club_treasurer_responsibilities.maintain_accounts: Maintain an accurate set of Club accounts and reconcile with monthly balances issued by the SA
club_treasurer_responsibilities.secure_event_planning: Be involved in Club event planning to ensure that event budget and related payments are secured in advance
club_treasurer_responsibilities.ensure_governance: Ensure Clubs are fiscally responsible – Club funds are for all members, not just the ExCo
club_treasurer_responsibilities.manage_transactions: Submit, track and manage Club transactions, including vendor payments, expense reimbursements & refunds
club_treasurer_responsibilities.stakeholder_management: Manage relationships with all external and internal stakeholders

balance_requirements.minimum_balance_note: Must maintain positive balance to be allowed to transact
balance_requirements.maximum_balance_note: Must stay at or below £20,000 for Coin Vote eligibility

spending_limits.exco_social_limit_note: ExCo-only spend may not exceed 10% of overall spend per quarter
spending_limits.social_per_head_limit_note: Social spending per event cannot exceed £45 per head (exceptions for all-member events if pre-agreed)

supplier_payment.description: For payments made to vendors based on formal invoices with wire instructions

invoice_requirements.address_to: London Business School Students Association, Sussex Place, Regent's Park, London, NW1 4SA

notes: Supplier invoices exceeding £8,000 must be pre-approved by SA Senior Treasurer
All new suppliers with invoices exceeding £5,000 must go through bank account verification
LBS Finance needs at least two weeks to process invoice payments

internal_transfer.description: Transfers of funds between Clubs or between Clubs and the SA
notes: The Club initiating the transfer must raise the finance code
For multiple recipients, attach an Excel with recipient names and amounts

expense_reimbursement.description: Reimburse Club leaders or members for spending out of pocket on behalf of the Club
notes: Reimbursements exceeding £1,000 must be pre-approved by SA Senior Treasurer
Social event amount cannot exceed £45 per head
All submissions without itemized receipts will be rejected

refund_request.description: For tickets purchased or fees paid in error or which the purchaser wants to cancel
notes: Clubs have discretion to decide when to allow refunds
Club Treasurer should complete this form, not Club members

finance_code_rules.purpose: Finance codes track revenues and expenses to/from your Club
finance_code_rules.timing: Request at least two weeks before event/spending occurs
finance_code_rules.reuse_criteria: May reuse codes from last year if exact same event
finance_code_rules.new_code_required_for: Any net new events not run last year
usage_examples: On CampusGroups event pages (Section 8 - Cost Center Code)

using_non_approved_ticketing.note: May not use any other ticketing platform
